## darken() function

Darken a standard CSS color

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function darken(css: string, value?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  css | string | the css color hex string |
|  value | number | <i>(Optional)</i> the value to darken by |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
